pinyin: ran3 se4 ti3 san1 bei4 ti3 zheng4

sentences.english: The house is three times as big as ours.
sentences.chinese: 這房子是我們房子的三倍年夜。

sentences.english: Schnoor said prices soared threefold in early 2008.
sentences.chinese: 斯諾說，在2008年早期，價格飆升至原來三倍。

sentences.english: That’s more than three times as fast as sales of men’s and women’s luxury outerwear in 2010.
sentences.chinese: 這比2010年男女奢侈品牌外套銷售的三倍還多。

sentences.english: Some ancient cities had two to three times as much water per person as many cities today.
sentences.chinese: 某些古代城市每人的用水量是今日許多城市的兩三倍。

sentences.english: Many major state universities doubled or tripled their enrollments in one or two years.
sentences.chinese: 許多主要州立大學的入學人數在一兩年內翻了兩三倍。

sentences.english: Sometimes I’ve had treble the amount of fruit and the quality of fruit is better too.
sentences.chinese: 有時候我能收穫三倍的水果，而且水果質量更高。

sentences.english: Cage-free hens generally have two to three times more space per bird than caged hens.
sentences.chinese: 每隻散養母雞擁有的空間通常是雞籠的兩到三倍。

sentences.english: There is a three-fold fall in the monthly profit.
sentences.chinese: 每個月的利潤都有三倍的回落。

sentences.english: In fact, they're three times more likely to get injured than someone in martial arts.
sentences.chinese: 事實上，他們比武術練習者受傷的可能性高三倍。

sentences.english: Watch the surf from the Triple Twin Room that looks out over Maunaloa Bay.
sentences.chinese: 從俯瞰毛納路爾灣的三倍雙人房觀看浪濤。

sentences.english: The New Campus of Jianghan University covers an area that is 3 times as big as the old campus.
sentences.chinese: 江漢大學新校區的佔地面積是老校區的三倍。

sentences.english: This rope is three times longer than that one.
sentences.chinese: 這根繩子是那根的三倍長。

sentences.english: FRIDAY This bridge is three times as long as that one.
sentences.chinese: 這座橋是那座橋的三倍長。

sentences.english: Investigators in other parts of the world have more than tripled these figures.
sentences.chinese: 世界其他部分的研究者又將這些數字翻了三倍。

sentences.english: Wuhan’s land prices have tripled in the last decade.
sentences.chinese: 武漢的土地價格在過去十年中上漲了三倍。

sentences.english: This river is three times as long as that one.
sentences.chinese: 這條河是那條河的三倍長。

definition: equal to/having the same social class or status
